channel.title: Resources on Kennedy Casey
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on Kennedy Casey

item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> PSY504 Final Project Tutorial PSY504 Final Project Tutorial Published May 13, 2024 Resource summary This blog post provides an introduction to the childesr package, a convenient tool for accessing transcript data from the Child Language Data Exchange System database (https://childes.talkbank.org/). This post serves to supplement the tutorials provided by the childes-db team (https://langcog.github.io/childes-db-website/) and to also illustrate an example logistic regression analysis using CHILDES data. Table of contents Jump to CHILDES overview section
